dev
Class DeviceUpdater

java.lang.Object
  dev.DeviceUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeviceMulticastUpdater
public class DeviceUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The updater thread which periodically refreshes the online devices list by pinging the nameserver. It also refreshes its own entry in the nameserver.

Author:
Mamta

Nested Class Summary
static interface DeviceUpdater.Listener
          The Listener interface allows dispatching event to listener object when a new device is detected as online.

getDevice

public Device getDevice(java.lang.String name)
Get the device object for the given device name. If not found, return null which means the device is offline.

Parameters:

setListener

public void setListener(DeviceUpdater.Listener listener)
Set a listener object which received device update events.

run

public void run()
The thread function first adds the local device to the nameserver then gets the current list of devices from the nameserver, periodically.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

setDevices

protected void setDevices(Device[] devices)
The setDevices function takes a new array of devices, and sets it in the internal devices list. Additionally, it calls the added and removed callback method on any event listener on this object.

Parameters:
devices -
